dashboardPage.summary: Here's a summary of your health intelligence today.
dashboardPage.insightExample: Your adherence this week is 20% higher than last week. Keep up the good work!
dashboardPage.geneticDesc: Based on your family history, we've identified 3 potential prevention strategies.
dashboardPage.consultDesc: Connect with professional doctors for live video consultations and expert advice.

reports.title: My Health Reports
reports.subtitle: Manage and analyze your diagnostic history.

reports.noResults: No reports found matching your search.
reports.aiAnalysisDesc: Our AI is analyzing your report...
reports.noReportsDesc: Upload a report to get started.

consultation.title: AI Health Consultation
consultation.subtitle: Get instant answers about your reports and general health concerns.
consultation.safeUsageDesc: Our AI provides information based on your data but is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with a doctor for critical decisions.

risk.title: Hereditary Risk Analysis
risk.subtitle: Personalized prevention strategies based on your family medical history.
risk.diabetesAdvice: Your genetic makeup shows a susceptibility to blood sugar fluctuations. Focus on low-glycemic foods.
risk.heartAdvice: Preventive cardiovascular measures are recommended. Monitor lipids and focus on healthy omega fats.
risk.generalAdvice: Maintaining a healthy lifestyle is key to mitigating this hereditary predisposition.
risk.diabetesDiet: Reduce refined sugar and process carbohydrates.
risk.generalDiet: Increase leafy greens and healthy fats.
risk.noRisksDesc: Update your health profile to see personalized prevention analysis.
risk.protectDesc: Hereditary risks are not destiny. With early intervention and consistent habits, most can be effectively managed.

planner.title: Daily Health Planner
planner.subtitle: AI-optimized routines tailored to your profile and recent reports.
planner.tipText: Consistency is more important than intensity when starting new routines.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.desc: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Check the URL or return home.

doctors.title: Doctor Consultation
doctors.subtitle: Connect with top specialists for instant medical advice.
doctors.moreToProceed: more to proceed with this consultation.

results.lifestyleDesc: Consume iron-rich foods like spinach, lentils, and pumpkin seeds during dinner. Avoid caffeine with meals as it inhibits iron absorption.
